gift_source:
::MATCH1::
Match the property to transform.
{
= Affine -> Lines and parallelism preserved
= Euclidean -> Lengths and angles preserved
= Similarity -> Shape preserved under scale
= Projective -> Straight lines preserved, not parallelism
}
title: MATCH1
question: Match the property to transform.

= Translation -> Shift

= Shearing -> Skew
}
